name: Greetings!
desc: A fellow student in Snowleaf Village has taught you 3 greetings.

name: Your Age?
desc: A villager asks your age. Learn how to ask other people!

name: Let's Eat!
desc:
Enjoy a 3 course meal and learn some
words related to food!

name: Let's Drink!
desc:
Learn about some popular Japanese
drinks!

name: Ninja Days
steps: Collect 1 gem from the Ghoul Ruins
desc:
Today, tomorrow, yesterday... What
adventures will these days bring?

name: Nature Stroll
desc:
Take a leisurely walk through the park
and learn the Japanese names for
different things.

name: Read Manga!
desc: The student outside the hospital in Tokyo is looking for a manga. Purchase it from a convenience store in town.

name: Seasons Change
desc:
Find and purchase a kotatsu for the
man in Tokyo.

name: Get Better Soon!
desc:
The doctor in at Tokyo Hospital needs
some medicine delivered from Hiroshima.

name: Colorful World
desc:
Collect 5 different color jewels at
Mount Fuji.

name: Coffee Time!
desc:
Learn some words that will be useful
at a cafe!
